thread.title: Ground News - Trapped in crashed truck, Indiana man rescued after 6 days surviving on rainwater
thread.title_full: Ground News - Trapped in crashed truck, Indiana man rescued after 6 days surviving on rainwater

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Trapped in crashed truck, Indiana man rescued after 6 days surviving on rainwater
text:
Summary by Ground News Matthew R. Reum of Mishawaka, Indiana, survived for six days on only rainwater. He was pinned tightly inside his crashed pickup truck beneath a highway bridge in northwest Indiana. Two men scouting for fishing spots on Tuesday afternoon noticed the badly damaged vehicle. They touched the body, and the person turned their head and started talking. Share menu More
Filters 12 Articles 12 Articles All Left Center Right
The Daily Caller Right Mixed Factuality Individual: Tucker Carlson Individual: Neil Patel Man Survives On Rainwater After Being Trapped In Crashed Truck For 6 Days An Indiana man who survived for six days in his crashed truck under an overpass was rescued Tuesday afternoon after fishermen discovered the wreck, ABC7 reported.
